Mu, ohh...!\""},{"lineNumber":24851,"originalJapaneseLine":"呼吸を読み、間合いを少しずつ詰めていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reading his breathing, he slowly closed the distance."},{"lineNumber":24852,"originalJapaneseLine":"繰り返し狙われる首への一撃を、強く弾き返す。","translatedEnglishLine":"He forcefully deflected the repeated strikes aimed at his neck."},{"lineNumber":24853,"originalJapaneseLine":"同時に、一気に踏み込んで、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the same time, he stepped in quickly,"},{"lineNumber":24854,"originalJapaneseLine":"メットごと頭を叩き割らんと、大剣を振り下ろし――","translatedEnglishLine":"and swung the great sword down to smash the helmeted head—"},{"lineNumber":24855,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あが、ごっ…………？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aga, guh...?!\""},{"lineNumber":24856,"originalJapaneseLine":"突如、視界が反転した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, his vision flipped."},{"lineNumber":24857,"originalJapaneseLine":"剣を振るどころではなく体勢が崩れ、倒れ込む。","translatedEnglishLine":"He was unable to swing his sword as his posture collapsed and he fell."},{"lineNumber":24858,"originalJapaneseLine":"弾いたはずの剣が翻り、膝から下を斬り落とされたと","translatedEnglishLine":"He realized that the sword he had deflected flipped and cut off his leg below the knee,"},{"lineNumber":24859,"originalJapaneseLine":"気づいたのは、倒れた視界いっぱいに、","translatedEnglishLine":"just after noticing, in his fallen field of vision,"},{"lineNumber":24860,"originalJapaneseLine":"朱い魔法剣の刃が映った直後の事だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the crimson blade of the magic sword appeared."},{"lineNumber":24861,"originalJapaneseLine":"（やっぱり、すごい……リック将軍……","translatedEnglishLine":"(As expected, amazing... General Rick..."},{"lineNumber":24862,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこまで弱い相手じゃなかったのに……）","translatedEnglishLine":"he wasn't such a weak opponent after all...)"},{"lineNumber":24863,"originalJapaneseLine":"その応酬も、メナド達後続の赤の軍が","translatedEnglishLine":"That exchange was only until Menado and the rest of the following Red Army"},{"lineNumber":24864,"originalJapaneseLine":"追いつくまでの、ほんの僅かな事でしかない。","translatedEnglishLine":"caught up, just a brief moment."},{"lineNumber":24865,"originalJapaneseLine":"そもそもにしてからが、魔物兵は通常の騎士でも","translatedEnglishLine":"From the beginning, even for normal knights,"},{"lineNumber":24866,"originalJapaneseLine":"三対一で戦う事が推奨されている。それほど強い。","translatedEnglishLine":"it is recommended to fight three to one against monster soldiers. They are that strong."},{"lineNumber":24867,"originalJapaneseLine":"その中でも腕が立つ相手を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even opponents skilled among a single breath, enough until their following troops arrived immediately,"},{"lineNumber":24877,"originalJapaneseLine":"間に交わした、小さなやりとりで充分だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a small exchange was path."},{"lineNumber":24883,"originalJapaneseLine":"L.C.M連山、山腹――","translatedEnglishLine":"L.C.M Mountain Range, mountainside—"},{"lineNumber":24884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エクス将軍、こちらは片付きました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"General Ex, this side is secured.\""},{"lineNumber":24885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっちもだ。大した被害はなかったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Same here. There was no significant damage.\""},{"lineNumber":24886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こちらも滞りなく」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here as well, without any issues.\""},{"lineNumber":24887,"originalJapaneseLine":"山麓から下の光景が一望出来る場所で、","translatedEnglishLine":"At a place overlooking the view below from the foothills,"},{"lineNumber":24888,"originalJapaneseLine":"白の軍、黒の軍、そしてJAPAN南国軍が","translatedEnglishLine":"the White Army, Black Army, and JAPAN's Southern Country Army"},{"lineNumber":24889,"originalJapaneseLine":"待機していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were waiting."},{"lineNumber":24890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、ご苦労さま。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, thank you for your hard work."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の剣士よ、いざ――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human swordsman, now—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むおっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Muo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックは足を止めることなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick did not stop his feet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法剣バイロードの間合いに入った瞬間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the moment he entered the range of the magical sword Byroad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その朱い切っ先で魔物隊長ムラクモの首を襲う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he struck the neck of the monster captain Murakumo with that crimson point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「できる、がッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can do it, but...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長の大剣が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain's great sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋭く速い切っ先を一合、二合と切り返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sharply and swiftly parried the tip strike once, then twice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の剣は俊敏だが、魔物以上の膂力はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human sword is agile, but does not have greater physical strength than the monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んッ……む、おぉッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nn... Mu, ohh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼吸を読み、間合いを少しずつ詰めていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reading his breathing, he slowly closed the distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 繰り返し狙われる首への一撃を、強く弾き返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He forcefully deflected the repeated strikes aimed at his neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時に、一気に踏み込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, he stepped in quickly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メットごと頭を叩き割らんと、大剣を振り下ろし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and swung the great sword down to smash the helmeted head—
"Aga, guh...?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如、視界が反転した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, his vision flipped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣を振るどころではなく体勢が崩れ、倒れ込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was unable to swing his sword as his posture collapsed and he fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弾いたはずの剣が翻り、膝から下を斬り落とされたと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He realized that the sword he had deflected flipped and cut off his leg below the knee,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づいたのは、倒れた視界いっぱいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just after noticing, in his fallen field of vision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朱い魔法剣の刃が映った直後の事だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the crimson blade of the magic sword appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （やっぱり、すごい……リック将軍……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (As expected, amazing... General Rick...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまで弱い相手じゃなかったのに……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he wasn't such a weak opponent after all...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その応酬も、メナド達後続の赤の軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That exchange was only until Menado and the rest of the following Red Army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いつくまでの、ほんの僅かな事でしかない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: caught up, just a brief moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそもにしてからが、魔物兵は通常の騎士でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the beginning, even for normal knights,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三対一で戦う事が推奨されている。それほど強い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is recommended to fight three to one against monster soldiers. They are that strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中でも腕が立つ相手を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even opponents skilled among them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 端から見れば雑兵と変わらぬように斬り捨てる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are cut down as if they were mere foot soldiers from an outside view.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど人間業ではなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was hardly a feat a human could do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すまない、副将。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, lieutenant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かい指揮は、全部任せてしまってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've left all the detailed command to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とんでもないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック将軍はお気になさらず、前に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Rick, please don't worry and move ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……付いていきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...We'll follow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんの一呼吸、すぐさま後続の部下達がくるまでの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a single breath, enough until their following troops arrived immediately,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に交わした、小さなやりとりで充分だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a small exchange was enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「斬り破ります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will cut through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――――――リーザスのために！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —— For Leazas!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 祖国を守るために、攻め破る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To defend the homeland, they attacked and broke through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍を先駆けとした、およそ二万のリーザス軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leazas army of roughly twenty thousand, led by the Red Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋼の津波と化して、山道を疾走していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: became a steel tsunami, rushing down the mountain path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: L.C.M連山、山腹――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: L.C.M Mountain Range, mountainside—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エクス将軍、こちらは片付きました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General Ex, this side is secured."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちもだ。大した被害はなかったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Same here. There was no significant damage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらも滞りなく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here as well, without any issues."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山麓から下の光景が一望出来る場所で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At a place overlooking the view below from the foothills,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白の軍、黒の軍、そしてJAPAN南国軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the White Army, Black Army, and JAPAN's Southern Country Army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待機していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were waiting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、ご苦労さま。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, thank you for your hard work.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の剣士よ、いざ――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human swordsman, now—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むおっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Muo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックは足を止めることなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick did not stop his feet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法剣バイロードの間合いに入った瞬間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the moment he entered the range of the magical sword Byroad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その朱い切っ先で魔物隊長ムラクモの首を襲う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he struck the neck of the monster captain Murakumo with that crimson point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「できる、がッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can do it, but...!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain's great sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋭く速い切っ先を一合、二合と切り返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sharply and swiftly parried the tip strike once, then twice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の剣は俊敏だが、魔物以上の膂力はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human sword is agile, but does not have greater physical strength than the monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んッ……む、おぉッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nn... Mu, ohh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼吸を読み、間合いを少しずつ詰めていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reading his breathing, he slowly closed the distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 繰り返し狙われる首への一撃を、強く弾き返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He forcefully deflected the repeated strikes aimed at his neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時に、一気に踏み込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, he stepped in quickly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メットごと頭を叩き割らんと、大剣を振り下ろし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and swung the great sword down to smash the helmeted head—
"Aga, guh...?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如、視界が反転した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, his vision flipped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣を振るどころではなく体勢が崩れ、倒れ込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was unable to swing his sword as his posture collapsed and he fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弾いたはずの剣が翻り、膝から下を斬り落とされたと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He realized that the sword he had deflected flipped and cut off his leg below the knee,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づいたのは、倒れた視界いっぱいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just after noticing, in his fallen field of vision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朱い魔法剣の刃が映った直後の事だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the crimson blade of the magic sword appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （やっぱり、すごい……リック将軍……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (As expected, amazing... General Rick...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまで弱い相手じゃなかったのに……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he wasn't such a weak opponent after all...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その応酬も、メナド達後続の赤の軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That exchange was only until Menado and the rest of the following Red Army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いつくまでの、ほんの僅かな事でしかない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: caught up, just a brief moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそもにしてからが、魔物兵は通常の騎士でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the beginning, even for normal knights,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三対一で戦う事が推奨されている。それほど強い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is recommended to fight three to one against monster soldiers. They are that strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中でも腕が立つ相手を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even opponents skilled among them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 端から見れば雑兵と変わらぬように斬り捨てる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are cut down as if they were mere foot soldiers from an outside view.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど人間業ではなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was hardly a feat a human could do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すまない、副将。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, lieutenant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かい指揮は、全部任せてしまってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've left all the detailed command to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とんでもないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック将軍はお気になさらず、前に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Rick, please don't worry and move ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……付いていきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...We'll follow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんの一呼吸、すぐさま後続の部下達がくるまでの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a single breath, enough until their following troops arrived immediately,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に交わした、小さなやりとりで充分だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a small exchange was enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「斬り破ります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will cut through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――――――リーザスのために！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —— For Leazas!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 祖国を守るために、攻め破る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To defend the homeland, they attacked and broke through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍を先駆けとした、およそ二万のリーザス軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leazas army of roughly twenty thousand, led by the Red Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋼の津波と化して、山道を疾走していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: became a steel tsunami, rushing down the mountain path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: L.C.M連山、山腹――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: L.C.M Mountain Range, mountainside—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エクス将軍、こちらは片付きました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General Ex, this side is secured."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちもだ。大した被害はなかったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Same here. There was no significant damage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらも滞りなく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here as well, without any issues."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山麓から下の光景が一望出来る場所で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At a place overlooking the view below from the foothills,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白の軍、黒の軍、そしてJAPAN南国軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the White Army, Black Army, and JAPAN's Southern Country Army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待機していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were waiting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、ご苦労さま。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, thank you for your hard work.
